rooms.description: Large open space integrated with the central courtyard for natural lighting and ventilation; designed to accommodate a joint family gathering area.
Efficient layout near the living area for seamless family interaction; includes Mediterranean tiled backsplash and energy-efficient appliances.
Adjacent to the kitchen for quick serving; designed with Mediterranean aesthetics and ample natural light.
Spacious room for guests with a small sitting area; includes storage and built-in wardrobe.
Essential bathroom facilities; designed with efficient water fixtures and natural lighting.
Compact storage space for daily essentials and household items.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with the central courtyard to promote positive energy flow.
Large windows providing ample natural light and ventilation in the living room.
Windows ensuring cross ventilation in the kitchen area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed to promote relaxation and privacy. Vastu-aligned placement for the head of the family.
Additional bedroom for joint family members; includes built-in storage and ample natural light.
Third bedroom, flexible space that can serve as a study or guest room.
Dedicated space for entertainment with optimized acoustics and comfortable seating; integrated lighting system.
Compact fitness area designed for personal workouts; includes space-efficient gym equipment and mirrored walls.

openings.description: Large windows in the master bedroom to allow natural light and maintain Vastu principles.
Strategically placed window to provide ambient light without compromising acoustics.
